Court of Protection Application

JE Bennett Law are a dedicated vulnerable client law firm based in Sevenoaks and we are specialists in making Court of Protection Applications.

We developed our business as Court of Protection Solicitors and are recognised as a leading firm by the Legal 500. Our team of specialist lawyers primarily serve clients throughout kent, London and the South East, but also represent people throughout the UK.

For more information about our Court of Protection Services read more

Or call us now on: 01732 454 983
to arrange a free and confidential phone consultation

If you'd like to find out how JE Bennett Law can help you, please get in touch. We understand just how daunting it can be when faced with these difficult decisions and we pride ourselves on being understanding and approachable.

Alternatively, if you'd prefer us to get in touch with you, please fill out the form below.
